If you have any questions please feel free to contact us! Here are our current offers:

Unmanaged:


E3-1270v2 / 32GB RAM / 2TB Hard Drive 
[$79 / month](https://my.ssdblaze.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=114) (code: LET1270)

Dual X5650 / 48GB RAM / 2TB HDD
[$83.99 / month](https://my.ssdblaze.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=51)

Dual X5670 / 48GB RAM / 1TB HDD
[$83.99 / month](https://my.ssdblaze.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=117) (code: LETX5670)

Dual X5650 / 48GB RAM / 1TB HDD
[$79 / month](https://my.ssdblaze.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=51)

*ALL servers come with 10TB Monthly Traffic, a 1Gbps port, and a /29!*

Current Locations: Dallas, Texas (East USA coming soon)

We can do custom builds on servers for our East USA expansion if you contact us.

[Looking Glass](http://lg-dal.ssdblaze.com/)

----------------------------------------

Support

You always have a way of getting help. Whether its LiveChat, Ticket, Phone, Email, or even Skype. We also have routine checkups to ensure you are happy with your server!

----------------------------------------

Control Panel

We provide a secure, fast, smooth, and easy to use control panel with every dedicated server. Our control panel gives you the ability to:

- Power Control
- Track Bandwidth (usage graphs)
- View IP Addresses
- Access KVM Console (IPMI/IDRAC)
- Reinstall OS
- View Uptime

Thanks!
